roleset.name: sodomize (or metaphorical extension)
roleset.note: Comparison to 'fuck.01', and as such can be used metaphorically (as in "aw, screw it"). No VNcls. Added by Julia based on BOLT.

example.name: metaphorical usage
example.text: got there and looked at each other and then said *PRO* ' bu99er it ' let s have some fun !
